subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The charismatic Monfils upset No. 7 Grigor Dimitrov on Tuesday, setting up a rematch with Federer just a few weeks after the two players last met.
snippet: The charismatic Monfils upset No. 7 Grigor Dimitrov on Tuesday, setting up a rematch with Federer just a few weeks after the two players last met.
